channel.title: Why is everyone such faggotry here?
channel.description:
why hasn't anyone dropped their balls
your all faggits without a life, seriously.
and by the way
HOLY SHIT I'M SO MUCH FUCKING COOLER BECAUSE I PUT A A SPECIAL CHARACTER IN MY NAME.
NONE OF YOU HAVE A LIFE, YOUR ALL PRETTY MUCH FUCKING PANSIES, EXCEPT FOR THAT DUDE WHO LOVES DRUGS, HE'S COOL. BUT THE REST OF YOU ARE FUCKING ASS SHITS. FUCK FUCK FUCK FUCK ALL OF YOU. SERIOUSLY, YOUR ALL GAY AS SHIT. YOU SHOULD ALL GO AND DIE.
PS, KISS MY ASS FOR ALL THE FAGS WHO WANT TO RANT.
PSS.
GUESS WHAT, I WAS CRYME TIME LULZ.
FUCK YOU ALL, good day. hope you all die of aids ;)
